text: This is a list of all transactions occurring in the 1998-99 NBA season. ==Events== If you want to see the transaction events (from July 1, 1998 to June 30, 1999), see the links below ==External links== *Basketball.RealGM.com *Basketball-Reference.com ==References== Transactions 1998-99
title: List of 1998–99 NBA season transactions
